channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12496] A blockedRequestsCount metric
item.description: blockedRequestsCount counts for requests blocked because mem size is greater than blockingMemStoreSize.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12681996/0001-HBASE-12496-Add-blockedRequestsCount-metric.patch
against trunk revision .

That zombie is unrelated to this change.

There is a minor spelling mistake ("blockedRequetsCount") in MetricsRegionServerWrapperImpl.java. I can fix that on commit.

Going to push to 0.98+ (will add Hadoop 1 support there) shortly unless objection.
